lines: They told me I was too old to take up arms against the Horde─that I couldn't possibly make a difference.
Wasn't until the wyverns came that I realized they were right.
The fight. Always, the fight... This is what we do. All we've ever done.
What's a soldier without a war─without an enemy? How are we to live in a peaceful world...?
I know I'm not the only one who thinks it, even if the others won't say it.
Everything I had, I left behind to fight for Ishgard. Now that the time has come, there is naught for me to lose...

After centuries of fighting, are we finally at peace...?
Bah! What a mawkish old fool I've become! I must needs return to my duties!
